moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Applied Patches
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will attempt to enumerate which patches are applied to a windows system
          based on the result of the WMI query: SELECT HotFixID FROM Win32_QuickFixEngineering.
author: zeroSteiner <zeroSteiner@gmail.com>
mubix <mubix@hak5.org>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
